suncertify.client.view
Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainWindow
public interface View

This is the interface exposed to the controller and its actions that is implemented by MainWindow and contains all methods that need to be implemented by the Gui View. Acts as a facade to the GUI components so that they can reengineered without the controller's knowledge.
